price: Kuma ga Allah gaibin* sammai da ƙasa yake, kuma al'amarin Sã'a bai zama ba fãce kamar walƙãwar gani, kõ kuwa shĩ ne mafi kusa! Lalle Allah a kan dukan kõme Mai ikon yi ne.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ غَيۡبُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَآ أَمۡرُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ إِلَّا كَلَمۡحِ ٱلۡبَصَرِ أَوۡ هُوَ أَقۡرَبُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
footnotes: * Ɓõye lõkacin Ƙiyãma a bãyan bayãnin tabbatar aukuwarta yanã daga cikin ni'imõmin Allah, dõmin mai hankali ya yi tattãli sabõda ita.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walillahi ghaybu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā amru al-sāʿati illā kalamḥi al-baṣari aw huwa aqrabu inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
